item.description:
C'mon, let's get back in the air... A Saturday out morning breakfast run! and then some.

Who has Blueberry Pancakes and Lighthouses? Only Maine... well, anyhow, let's go there....Have you been to Sanford (SFM) Lately? They have a great breakfast at the Cockpit Cafe located on the field.

We did this last year and it was a lot of fun. SFM for breakfast, then off the coast. The controller even gave us all the 5 cent tour!

and I quote Gary Archer...
"...If I remember correctly there are about five or six light houses along the coast within a few miles of each other. From here we contact Portland Apc. and request flight following with the light house tour. These guys do a great job and I found it very easy to do. Portland actually vectors you at a set altitude towards and around all the light houses, they even spin you around if you want to view them all over again in the other direction. "

So don't forget to ask your loved one or a friend to join you. Your not going to want to miss this one and don't forget that camera...HOW BOUT THAT.

http://www.airnav.com...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Blueberry Pancakes and Lighthouses! Saturday at Sanford The Light House tour.
